summary: User unable to build TypeScript SDK application with Worker due to unresolved module '__temporal_custom_payload_converter'. The issue stems from bundling the Worker and requires clarification on setup and bundling approach.
userImpact: Users cannot build applications with Workers due to missing module resolution, blocking workflow execution with Worker infrastructure.
rootCause: Unclear bundling configuration or missing dependencies when bundling the Worker component in the application build process.
resolutionDetails: Issue closed as invalid - determined to be a configuration/usage issue rather than a SDK bug. User needed to provide more details about their bundling setup.
keyQuote: Can you please give more details? Why and how are you bundling the Worker itself?
